content:
The American Apparel BB401 is a style of T-shirt made by the clothing brand American Apparel. It is a unisex, short-sleeved T-shirt that is popular for its softness, durability, and versatility. The BB401 is made from 100% fine jersey cotton, which is a high-quality, lightweight cotton that is tightly knitted to create a smooth, comfortable texture.

The BB401 has a slim fit that is designed to be form-fitting without being too tight or restrictive. It has a double-stitched neckline and sleeves for added durability, and is available in a variety of colors and sizes.

The BB401 is a popular choice for those looking for a comfortable, fashionable T-shirt that can be worn in a variety of settings and styles. It is often used for screen printing and customization, and is known for its ability to hold color well and resist fading over time.

Overall, the American Apparel BB401 is a high-quality, comfortable T-shirt that is designed to provide a slim, form-fitting look. It is a popular choice for those looking for a fashionable, versatile T-shirt that can work well in a variety of settings and styles.
